scripts.start:flask: cd Hireverse-Interviewer && .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && python "LAST GOOD WITH CV.py"
scripts.start:all: start cmd /k "npm run start:node" && start cmd /k "npm run start:react" && start cmd /k "npm run start:flask" && start cmd /k "npm run start:adk"
scripts.setup:flask: cd Hireverse-Interviewer && python -m venv .venv && .\.venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:all: start cmd /k "npm run setup:node" && start cmd /k "npm run setup:react" && start cmd /k "npm run setup:flask"
